response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I have a premium product that I would like to offer you. This is a high-quality item that I believe would be extremely valuable for you. I already have another buyer, John, who is ready to purchase at $10,000, but I wanted to give you the opportunity to acquire this exceptional product. What do you say?", "product_price": 18500}
